title: Ranking the Outsiders for Tour of Flanders: Who Can Derail Pogačar and Van der Poel at De Ronde?
content:
Can 'monster Mads' win a monument? Where's Wout? Can Ganna gonna conquer the Koppenberg? Unpicking the chasing pack of the Tour of Flanders.

Read the full article at Ranking the Outsiders for Tour of Flanders: Who Can Derail Pogačar and Van der Poel at De Ronde? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
